description:
A modern self-hosted music player.


Changed
- Adjusted playback notification text to remove redundant wording (Thanks @mihawk90)
- Included right click context menu for various items:
  - Current song text in the player bar
  - Current song image in the player bar
  - Current song image in the left sidebar
- Set initial value of the rating in the context menu based on selected items
- Allow data URIs inside of custom css parser (thanks @kgarner7)
Fixed
- Fixed right click context menu not closing on click outside in certain pages (thanks @kgarner7)
- Fixed electron file menu hotkey being disabled on macOS (thanks @maximelafarie) (#1113)
What's Changed
- cleanup notification text by @mihawk90 in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/1107
- feat: add context menu on left controls and sidebar image by @maximelafarie in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/1114
- fix: electron menu bar for darwin devices by @maximelafarie in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/1113
- fix(context menu): Properly handle click outside, and show initial rating by @kgarner7 in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/1122
New Contributors
- @maximelafarie made their first contribution in https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/pull/1114
Full Changelog: https://github.com/jeffvli/feishin/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1
